key.name: nightscout-url
key.description: URL of the Nightscout instance that you want to use

key.name: authentication-token
key.description: Sometimes also called access token. Used to access a Nightscout site that has access control

key.name: refresh-interval
key.description: Amount of seconds between data pulls to the server

key.name: stale-data-threshold
key.description: Amount of minutes that must pass since the last reading before the data is considered outdated

key.name: show-delta
key.description: The variation between the current and the previous glucose level

key.name: show-trend-arrows
key.description: Trend arrows next to your reading

key.name: show-elapsed-time
key.description: Toggle to display the time passed since the last reading received

key.name: show-stale-elapsed-time
key.description: Toggle to display the time passed since the last reading received when it's stale

key.name: notification-out-of-range
key.description: Toggle to receive a notification when going out of your target range

key.name: notification-stale-data
key.description: Toggle to receive a notification when you don't receive updates in a specific period of time

key.name: notification-rapidly-changes
key.description: Toggle to receive a notification when the levels rise or drop fast

key.name: timeout-time
key.description: The amount of time in seconds to declare that a call timed out (your server didn't answer)

key.name: units-selection
key.description: Units to display glucose values in. 'auto' uses server settings, 'mg/dl' or 'mmol/L' for manual selection
